WOOOHOOO! The next Executive Strategy Summit is set for Friday and Saturday, January 19-20, 2018 in Denver.

Designed specifically for founders and owners of entrepreneurial companies who need to upgrade their business skills, executive skills, and want to leave with an up-leveled Monday-ready business plan.
Check the website for the results others have enjoyed from the last event.

This year, we're holding it at the Human Universal Education Center, part of John Augspurger and Allyson Baker's magnificent facilities in Denver, and includes healthy, chef-created breakfast and lunch.

The curriculum includes new updates on discoveries over the past year, specifically around executive behaviors, motivators, and blind spots, and additional details about the Fast Funnel and speeding customer decisions.
Who can you think of that would find attending valuable? The next five tickets are two for one.
If you're interested but uncertain, let's have a conversation about how this might get you where you want to to in 2018.
Details in the link in the first comment.

“The proportion of spuriousness in the data increases as one gets more immersed in it. The more frequently you look at data, the more noise you are disproportionately likely to get… Which is why anyone who listens to news (except when very, very significant events take place) is one step below sucker…” News ‘junkies’ tend to get “overanxious, oversensitive, and neurotic, hence distracted and confused” – easier to manipulate.

Host, Selling Disruption Show, the Podcast for Those Who Depend on Disruptive Sales & Marketing

I'm honored to interview the brightest and most disruptive minds who are at the forefront of changing the World. They freely share their systems and secrets so you can be inspired and become one of us. Find Selling Disruption Show on Apple Podcasts or at http://SellingDisruptionShow.com

Design and implement customer acquisition systems* Automatic lead generation* Go-to-market research & strategy development* Product, marketing, sales, and customer service development and integration* Launches for disruptive products (direct & channels)Grow business skills for entrepreneurial organizations* Teach you, coach you, do it for you, do it with you* Private and group coaching* Event keynote speeches and workshopsWe believe that your passion is your destiny and when you operate your business out of your authentic consciousness, you must succeed.Yet, you just might need some training, help, support, and encouragement to get there. “Bija” means seed, so we believe that the seeds of greatness are in you. We are here to nurture your passion into a successful business.We work with business owners, creators, healers, artists, musicians, and other passionate people to make a living out of what drives them from their heart. Our clients have a passion to bring an idea to the world. They’ve connected to their purpose and want to see it realized.Here’s how we do it:* We help business owners connect with their authentic purpose* We help them create a sound business plan to realize their potential* We coach them to channel their passion into a viable business* We provide training, tools, and workshops to make sound, aligned  decisions and take right action to achieve real business performance and a fair profit* We’ll teach you how to do it and can coach you through it. We offer on-line education, business tools, resources, group and personal coaching, community, workshops, and webinars to help you get what you need to connect and accelerate your business. We tailor our programs and initiatives to the uniqueness of your products, services, and markets.

For details, see www.oceinc.comWhat We Do:We help companies with new, disruptive technology sell lots and lots of it by combining sales skills with product knowledge so that sales reps are excited and confident to talk with the right prospects about the right thing. We bring our clients "do how" instead of just "know how."We help people build new sales channels and get more out of the channels they have, sometimes called channel enablement or sales enablement.Business Strategy Development CapabilitiesGo-to-market research and plan development  * New product introduction  * Feasibility, value proposition, messaging  * Competitive battle plansChannel enablement design and deployment  * Channel management strategy  * Channel partner developmentComprehensive curriculum development  * Turnkey multi-element programs  * Certification designCustom solution-based training  * Unique IT sales best practices  * Global capabilities with multi-language supportTactical Implementation CapabilitiesChannel and market research  * Needs, attitudes, gaps, opportunitiesCustom solution-based training  * Web-based, instructor-led, audio/videoLive events  * Keynote, breakout, half-day, full-day, multi-dayEvent management logistics  * Audience acquisition  * On-site services  * Catering and logisticsCustom publications  * Books, articles, white papers, sales playbooksComprehensive reporting   * ROI, proof of performance, long-term performance trackingOur methodology focuses on action and results, with specific metrics achieved within specific time frames. We have a proven success with key industry leaders, and we guarantee our performance. Our programs will make an immediate difference in your business.

Sales training and consulting for Fortune 1000 clients. Based on the books, "Guerrilla Marketing", "Guerrilla Selling", "Guerrilla TeleSelling", "Guerrilla Tradeshow Selling", "Guerrilla Negotiating".In 1992, Mark joined The Guerrilla Group and co-authored Guerrilla Trade Show Selling, Guerrilla Teleselling, and Guerrilla Negotiating with Guerrilla Marketing author, Jay Conrad Levinson, and Guerrilla Selling author, Orvel Ray Wilson. He co-created the wildly successful Executive Assessment channel sales tool for IBM, writing approximately 70 product-specific versions for IBM's major software brands, including DB2®, WebSphere®, Lotus®, Tivoli®, and Start Now.
Film Committee, Chief Engineer WUTK, Announcer WUOT

Once I learned that I could make three times more money at a radio station with my head in the transmitter and my feet on the antenna then in front of a microphone, I took electrical engineering with an emphasis in antenna theory. I worked in the electronics lab of the chemistry department building special projects, repairing and calibrating test equipment, and tuning the NMR for organic chem class. I also was on-air announcer for WUOT and chief engineer for student radio station WUTK. I also chased girls and drank a lot of beer. But, hey, I got out with a 3.5 GPA.

I was the first graduate of the AS Media Technology degree, featuring audio, video, and graphic media production. Here I learned the skills I still use today to create training materials for clients. I worked at WSMC-FM radio station for the entire time I was there doing sign-ons and sign-offs, but usually not on the same day. I became the assistant engineer with a First Class Radio Telephone license. And I spent every spare minute in the computer lab where I learned how to program. And I chased girls and joined buddies in practical jokes.

Endorsed by 9 of Mark S A’S colleagues at Hewlett Packard Enterprise
summary: Upgrade Your Strategic Executive Skills and Attitudes to Realize Your Vision and Radically Increase Profits with the Executive Strategy Skills Summit in Denver, Jan 19-20, 2018.Specifically created for profit-and-loss-responsible executives of companies, operations, or divisions from $5 million to $100 million in revenue, this 2 day event brings executive skills and insights to founders and staff who occupy the executive suite. The exception: a P&L responsible exec may bring select team members they wish to groom for greater responsibility.In our market research, business consulting, and executive coaching work, we’ve learned that in small and mid-size businesses, most top execs have limited strategic skills. While they’ve been successful with their past work, they’ve never acquired the required strategic skills and holistic view of the business, so become secretly overwhelmed and uncertain about what to do.There are three basic skills gaps: Insufficient business acumen, no customer acquisition system, and undefined culture. In this event, we fix this.Key outcomes:* Develop your executive skill stack — what it is, how it’s radically different from a managerial skill stack, and how to intentionally develop it* A deep understanding of the Seven Business Pillars™: Product, Marketing, Sales, Service, Infrastructure, Finance, and Culture, which give you a holistic view of your business* Master critical executive business concepts that apply to B2B and B2C, for goods and services, for commercial, non-profit, and governmental operations* Develop your own Monday-ready phased plan to improve results and grow your companyWhat makes this executive event different is the holistic view of business, not just sales or marketing or leadership, but everything required to operate a sustainable, scalable, profitable, and salable business.Let's talk to see how this supports your goals: http://MarksSchedule.comMore at http://ExecutiveStrategySummit.com
name: Mark S A Smith
title: Hosting the Executive Strategy Skills Summit, Jan 19-20 2018, Denver. When you can't work harder, work smarter.
